|elevation_m = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} 'Bohr' (; also known as
'BÄr') is a village in Shabankareh Rural District, Shabankareh
District, Dashtestan County, Bushehr Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its
population was 278, in 55 families.
